title: Single resident occupancy unit - furnished, bathroom, free utilities
posting_body: ['AVAILABLE NOW!!', 'Why share a house or apartment and have roommates when you can have a private unit with your own bathroom, not shared?', '++ Private room with private entrace, private bathroom in unit.', '++ Fully furnished room with bed, desk, chair, shelves, closet', '++ All utilities included!', 'WIFI, water, electricity, garbage included!', '++ 2 blocks from campus and 2 blocks from Bart.', 'AMAZING location!', '++ No kitchens in building, but each unit has mini-fridge, microwave, and vanity/sink', '++ Walk to dozens of restaurants, cafes, coffee shops, stores, just downstairs of our building', '++ Quiet, courteous tenants only.', 'Onsite manager 24/7.', '++ No shares allowed, single tenant occupancy only', 'Room with private bathroom:', '12-month lease: $1375 per month', '6-11 month lease: $1450 per month', '2-5 month lease: $1500 per month', 'Room with shared bathrooms:', '12-month lease: $1050 per month', '6-11 month lease: $1125 per month', '2-5 month lease: $1250 per month', 'Please call manager Ms Kathy to tour the property.', 'show contact info', 'thanks!']
